title: Introducing The Topical
description:
Our friends at The Onion created a new podcast called 'The Topical', a satirical takedown of daily news shows. The show premieres January 29, anywhere you listen to podcasts
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
